page.title: 10COURTAULD AND CRITTALL
page.content: Industrial life in Braintree has been developed largely through the medium of two firms.Courtauld for the silk industry and crittall for the metal industry. George courtauld erected a mill in Braintree in 1809 and the business prospered to be a world wide name.Now nolonger in Braintree the Courtauld name is assouated with the town through the many public benefactions made by members of the family.Crittals has its origins in a shop in bank street from 1849. The firm has two interest ironmiongery and metal working.Parts of the metal window factory can be found in premises built in 1893 in Manor street.
